EmailTemplate.subject: Integrating virtual care for consumers managing multiple chronic conditions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Integrating Virtual Care for Consumers Managing Multiple Chronic Conditions
Thursday, December 1 | 1 p.m. Eastern
People living with chronic conditions interact with the healthcare system more often than other populations. And as the number of chronic conditions a person has increases, so do the challenges they may have managing their healthcare.
Join our webinar to hear about new research on how people with multiple chronic conditions seek and manage care, the impact of mental health challenges on condition management and more.
Register now <[[https://www.ahip.org/webinars/integrating-virtual-care-for-consumers-managing-multiple-chronic-conditions]]>
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
